WRITING.TEXT:
Good eye contact, definitely dress well, never sound like there is any ounce of fear or insecurity in your voice.
Fake it till ya make it
I became less dependent on people. I learned that it's nice to have friends and all but popularity is shit in the real world. Just do your thing and people will appreciate that more.
Work on bettering yourself. People hate others that are doing well and show them that you are.

Haha! This is a good one but it never really bothered me because of who did it (complete hack).
Me and another person were interning at a magazine to fulfill our school requirements and we wrote up articles to be submitted and the associate editor came to us after and sneered "oh so you guys can actually write. I guess we don't need you steaming our clothes for photo shoots anymore."
